name: SafeMiraie
0:
”Alexa, show my living room”
”Alexa, hide my living room”
”Alexa, stop”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Now you can view your SafeMiraie cameras at anytime from anywhere with Alexa.

To get started, enable this skill, login with your SafeMiraie account, and say "Alexa, show my living room" or whatever you named your device.
